SELECT count(*) from tzw_order m where m.tzw_order_user_id=#{tzw_order_user_id}

select count(*) from tzw_item t1
WHERE t1.tzw_item_name LIKE concat('%',#{lname},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into tzw_item(tzw_item_name, tzw_item_price, tzw_item_num, tzw_item_status, tzw_item_desc, tzw_item_picture, tzw_item_createDate, tzw_item_jifen, tzw_item_jingpai, tzw_item_content, tzw_item_new, tzw_item_type, tzw_item_leibie, tzw_item_choujiang ) values(#{tzw_item_name}, #{tzw_item_price}, #{tzw_item_num}, #{tzw_item_status}, #{tzw_item_desc}, #{tzw_item_picture}, #{tzw_item_createDate}, #{tzw_item_jifen}, #{tzw_item_jingpai}, #{tzw_item_content}, #{tzw_item_new}, #{tzw_item_type}, #{tzw_item_leibie}, #{tzw_item_choujiang} )

insert into tzw_choujiang (tzw_choujiang_item_id, tzw_choujiang_houNum, tzw_choujiang_preNum, tzw_choujiang_jifen, tzw_choujiang_yue, tzw_choujiang_xianjin, tzw_choujiang_createDate ) values ( #{tzw_choujiang_item_id}, #{tzw_choujiang_houNum}, #{tzw_choujiang_preNum}, #{tzw_choujiang_jifen}, #{tzw_choujiang_yue}, #{tzw_choujiang_xianjin}, #{tzw_choujiang_createDate} );

tzw_jingpai_liupai, tzw_jingpai_jifen, tzw_jingpai_yue, tzw_jingpai_xianjin, tzw_jingpai_num ) values ( #{tzw_jingpai_createDate}, #{tzw_jingpai_item_id}, #{tzw_jingpai_liupai}, #{tzw_jingpai_jifen}, #{tzw_jingpai_yue}, #{tzw_jingpai_xianjin}, #{tzw_jingpai_num} );
